command: aws iam create-service-specific-credential --user-name liam.w.nolan --service-name codecommit.amazonaws.com --output json
explanation: Creates a service-specific credential for CodeCommit, simulating a developer/reporting workflow and increasing the persona's realism through typical tooling access.
rationale_steps: Enable service-scoped credentials aligned with common developer tools.
Reflect normal operational needs without elevating global privileges.
Return JSON to store credentials metadata securely.
